page.title: 17Entertainment Newton/Linton.
page.content: In the Widdington area there is no form of entertainment at all. In Newton-on-Ouse and Linton-on-Ouse various activities take place.A group has met in Newton-on-Ouse for many years to play Bingo and in Linton whist drives and domino drives alternate weekly. Newton Singers,a group of ladies under a male conductor,meet weekly and entertain in the area. There is no commercial entertainment operating in the area,but residents are well-served for entertainment in York,where the Theatre Royal has shows by the resident company and touring companies. There is a good variety of other forms of entertainment and cultural activities in York.
